title: Champion select bug
body: Timer would reach 0 and would be stuck there, surely it cant just be me because I've encountered 6 dodges in a row but I've now dodged 3 games in a row. champion select chat works as per usual, nothing else is functional.

replies.body:
Update @ 17:10 AEDT

We've been monitoring our systems, as well as the third party systems that were affected by congestion for the last hour and we've seen solid signs that things are back to normal.  We're confident that champ select experience should be good for the majority of players, so we're enabling ranked queues again.

Sorry for the bumpy ride today!

Cheers
Mindstar

ISP: Kogan Internet.

Trace Route:


Tracing route to prod.oc1.lol.riotgames.com [192.64.169.20]

*I'm struggling to log onto client since patching today and when I do connect to the client I am unable to start games, my friend's list is barely functional and I cannot invite people.

having the same thing, first the client froze during champion bans and then i tried again later and it froze during champion selection, timer goes to 0, chat doesn't work, and clicking on champ icons doesn't do anything. to add to this the client has felt a little slower overall and the shop was also having issues connecting and had to just keep trying, took at least 10 tries before i could get to the chroma skins tab.

Further Update @ 16:20 AEDT

We're still waiting for the upstream provider to take action.  

The TL;DR here is it appears many ISPs in the region today have been impacted by a backbone provider turning on a new service unexpectedly.  The service is presently overloaded, and as a result has seen a lot of unexpected congestion for Australian ISPs.  This has taken many by surprise, but some are actively working to route around the congestion point.

We are doing what we can to try and get the issue resolved, although it is largely outside of Riot's control at this point.  Because of this, we're still keeping ranked offline until we are confident most players will be able to get through champ select without a dodge penalty.

Thanks for your understanding.

Cheers
Mindstar

> Mindstar

Sorry to be a bother, is there any update to this? Is the issue still persisting? My connection issues have for the most part continued to be a problem, a problem that I primarily am only experiencing in League of Legends.

Hi folks

Updating this - we're seeing an issue with one of the backbone ISPs between the USA and Australia.  It seems to be affecting quite a few things online for the affected people, and we've raised a ticket with them.  In the meantime the Riot team are doing what we can to route around the issue (aka - using other ISPs).  Unfortunately not all Australian ISPs have multiple routes available, meaning that for some players we have to wait for the backbone ISP to fix their path.

I'll update here when we know more.

Cheers
Mindstar

Tried to do a trace route but don't have admin privileges in the gaming cafe to run it. Client very slow and unresponsive. When/if I finally get in to a game it won't allow hero selection and then I see everyone in the lobby get kicked out, with a nice increasing ban time as the reward for trying. Frustrated and giving up. Disappointing to waste an hour trying.
Having the same issues, entered two games. Couldn't pick or ban champs, got kicked out both times.

Not sure if it matters but did a couple tests and it went through telstra the second time with lower ping.

Hi folks

We're seeing a few reports of issues like this one.

Can you send in the following info:

 * Your ISP (eg. Telstra, Optus, Spark etc)
 * A Trace Route to the OCE Server

You can paste it here, or send it in via a [Player Support](http://support.riotgames.com) ticket

**Obtaining a Trace Route**

 * Press the [Windows Key] (that is the key on the left side of the space bar, between ctrl and alt) + R
 * Type cmd in the search bar and click "Ok". You should now see a black window with white letters.
 * Highlight and copy the command based on the server you are trying to connect to: 
 * (tracert prod.oc1.lol.riotgames.com) > "%USERPROFILE%\desktop\Tracert.txt"
 * and
 * (tracert 103.240.227.25) > "%USERPROFILE%\desktop\Tracert.txt"

Ive had it happen in every game since the latest patch, first 2 games it eventually loaded but the last game it dodged me and counted as a loss on my promotions. Multiple people in every lobby with the same issue so im hoping they refund the loss cuz its a client issue
